case.name: Spectrum 2 Case
notes: Weapon Contents Are From The Spectrum 2 Collection; Rare Special Items Are Spectrum Knife Types With Chroma Finishes.
Drop Weights Use The Default Tier Odds Provided By The Export Schema.

warnings: Doppler Finish Is Expanded Into Phase And Gem Variants For Simulator Completeness; Individual Phase Availability Is Not Explicitly Enumerated By Some Case Listing Sites.
StatTrak Weights Use A Per-Item 10% Split With Half-Up Rounding.
